Class PluginSpecification

java.lang.Object
  com.continuent.tungsten.replicator.plugin.PluginSpecification

public class PluginSpecification
extends java.lang.Object

Specification for a component, including the implementation class and input properties, and utility methods to manage the component life cycle.
